testcase.classname: US1021 Signup Page Password Strength Level Check
testcase.name: Check if you can see strength menu's password info

testcase.failure:
Given The user opens the Expedia signup page................................passed And The user will enter an eight-character password that meets all requirements, but will still be considered Weak.passed And The user will enter an nine-character password that meets all requirements, it will be considered Strong.failed And The user will enter an eleven-character password that meets all requirements and last two characters must different three before the last one then it will be considered Very Strong.skipped
